ygData.subject: Re: My overcrowding solutuion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My friends and I did this early on too.  Frankly, I m not sure I d consider being relegated to unpopular dungeons like the old Paw, UGuk, and Permafrost
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 27 Jan 2000, Papa Legba wrote:
>
> Well by reducing crowding, you do have the OPTION to dungeon crawl if
> you want to take it. This is pretty much what my group used to do in
> Paw (since we were alone in there) and UpperGuk, since often the squire
> is the only guy we can take who is camped... It would be nice to have
> that option in other dungeons as well.

My friends and I did this early on too. Frankly, I'm not sure
I'd consider being relegated to "unpopular" dungeons like the
old Paw, UGuk, and Permafrost as really having options. We
did a lot of crawls in those, and even then most of the named
spawns were camped so we ended up with a bunch of mid-20s
characters with mid-teens equipment.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
